title: Does Viprezi have peanut oil?
subtitle: Social media users exchanged narrative reports on peanut oils, tree nuts or undeclared by-products in Viprezi and other products of Procter & Gamble, but P&G stated that non-food items were either appropriately marked or nut-free.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Vibrez and other Proctor and Gamble products contain undeclared oils or by-products of peanuts and tree nuts, which pose a risk to individuals with nuts allergies.
